Class ROfRhoDetector

Namespace
Vts.MonteCarlo.Detectors
Assembly
Vts.dll

Implements IDetector. Tally for reflectance as a function of Rho. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

public class ROfRhoDetector : Detector, IDetector
